item.title: Mastering Nmap for Real-World Network Scanning
item.description: A deep dive into mastering Nmap for real-world network scanning with full command outputs, analysis, use cases, and expert tips. Learn how to use Nmap for auditing your local network like a pro.

item.title: üîç Recon-ng Mastery: Complete OSINT Framework Guide (Beginner to Expert)
item.description:
üöÄ Learn how to use Recon-ng from scratch to expert level with real-world examples, commands, API tips, and professional automation workflows.

üß† What is Recon-ng?

Recon-ng is an open-source OSINT (Open Source Intelligence) framework written in Python that helps security researchers, red teamers, and bug bounty hunters automate reconnaissance tasks.

It mimics the Metasploit interface, offering powerful modules to collect intel like domains, hosts, credentials, social profiles, leaked data, and more ‚Äî all in an automated, database-backed workspace.
